snippet.title: Siege of Centauri - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/524010/Siege_of_Centauri/
www.siegeofcentauri.com
Thousands of alien machines are descending on Earth's first interstellar colony in this massive-scale new tower defense game from the makers of Ashes of the Singularity and Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion.
* * * *
#towerdefense #pcgames
